meanings.definition: A network that is a part of a larger network.
meanings.sent1: The subnetworked computers in our office are connected to the main network.
meanings.sent2: The subnetworked printers in the building are all linked to the central server.
meanings.sent3: The subnetworked devices had a party and invited the main network to join in!
meanings.sent4: The subnetworked classrooms are like small islands in the vast ocean of the school network.
meanings.sent5: The subnetworked area is like a cozy neighborhood within the bustling city of the main network.

meanings.definition: To connect multiple smaller networks together to form a larger network.
meanings.sent1: We need to subnetworked the different departments to improve communication.
meanings.sent2: The IT team will subnetworked the servers for better data sharing.
meanings.sent3: The company decided to subnetworked all its branches to streamline operations.
meanings.sent4: She managed to subnetworked the various systems seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The project manager will subnetworked the teams for a more efficient workflow.
